publicationStmt.p: Publication Information - how we are publishing in the context of our class

normalization.p: This is where you can discuss choices you made about modernization spelling (or not)

quotation.p: info about how you approached quoted text

correction.p: If you discovered errors in your text, you can talk here about where you decided to correct them or not.

interpretation.p: You can add interpretive info here.

body.p: This is Nic trying to use GitHub, send help
